alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 1:53PM MDT until July 30 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... South central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 153 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Johnson Siding, or 10 miles northeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hisega around 200 PM MDT. Sheridan Lake around 205 PM MDT. Southwestern Rapid City and Keystone Wye around 210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Keystone, Rockerville, Bear Country, Reptile Gardens, Hayward, Hart Ranch, Black Gap and Hermosa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
